<NEW - WHEELIE>

W=
HEELIE nodded, "You're definitely ont up and ready to go, you can barely mo=
ve, don't you know.  You look like you've been smashed through the Pit, tor=
n apart like a git.  To you I would suggest, you can only lay down to be fi=
xed and rest.  Over to the two of them, I would suggest they get you to sta=
y down again.  Before you go out half cocked, I would suggest they make sur=
e you're stasis locked."

Pausing to look over at UNUS.  "Things are gettin=
g potentially very bad.  With MAGMATRON out and had.  Most would have htoug=
ht he was dead.  IF he is here, things will be worse before we can get ahea=
d.  Combined with the presence of CRYOTEK, if the two would meet all would =
go to Drek."

Nodding quietly, "Don't worry, I'll be here, and I think ther=
e's nothing you have to fear.  Take your time, here'll you'll stay, or I'll=
 rhyme until you go away!"
